data.title: Best Movies Like Cleopatra 1963
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Cleopatra: Agora (2009), Rome (2005), Becket (1964), Troy (2004), Tut (2015), Queen Margot (1994), A Royal Affair (2012), Lady Jane (1986), The Young Victoria (2009), The Fall of the Roman Empire (1964)
data.text:
Genre: Biography, Drama, History, Romance

Country: USA, Switzerland, UK

Duration: 192 min.

Story: Historical epic. The triumphs and tragedy of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra.The winner of four Oscars, this epic saga of love, greed and betrayal stars Elizabeth Taylor as the passionate and ambitious Egyptian queen who's determined to hold on to the throne and seduces the Roman emperor Julius Caesar (Rex Harrison). When Caesar is murdered, she redirects her attentions to his general, Marc Antony (Richard Burton), who vows to take power -- but Caesar's successor (Roddy McDowall) has other plans.
